entries.title: What Is Blockchain? The Complete WIRED Guide
entries.description: The idea of creating tamper-proof databases has captured the attention of everyone from anarchist techies to staid bankers.

entries.title: Get Used to Face Recognition in Stadiums
entries.description: Madison Square Garden is under fire for using the technology. Other venues are exploring their own uses of face algorithms, raising privacy concerns.

entries.title: How the US Could Ban TikTok in 7 Not-So-Easy Steps
entries.description: Former president Trump tried and failed to ban the app. Now US lawmakers from both parties are preparing legislation they say can finish the job.

entries.title: The Kremlin Has Entered the Chat
entries.description: Russian antiwar activists placed their faith in Telegram, a supposedly secure messaging app. How does Putin’s regime seem to know their every move?
